website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a mid-sized, mid-powered microwave in an attention-grabbing color, this reasonably priced model is worth a look despite a few frustrating qualities.
pros: Stands out for the bright red color that's ideal for unique or edgy kitchen decor
With 900 watts, it's somewhat more powered than lower-level options by the brand
Has six one-touch quick start buttons
cons: The downside of the red finish is that it's not for everyone
No door release button, and the handle is hard to pull
Plate tends to fall off the turntable

product_meta.title: Bella 900-Watt Microwave Oven, 0.9 Cubic Feet, Red with Chrome
product_meta.description: Bring a touch of fun and style to your kitchen with the family-sized countertop microwave from Bella. The Bella 0.9 Cubic Foot microwave oven offers 900 Watts of power and 10 power levels for versatile food prep. This countertop model features a removable 10.6-inch turntable to ensure even heating for oversized dinner plates and cookware. The Bella microwave includes an easy to use digital interface with an LED clock and kitchen timer. One-Touch cooking is at your fingertips with 1-6 minute Express Cook controls, convenient +30-Seconds control and 6 Quick Start One-Touch cooking functions for popcorn, beverage, dinner plate and more. The Bella microwave allows you to defrost by time or weight and offers Multi-Stage cooking that adjusts power level during the cooking cycle for greater control. Thanks to a memory function you can save and recall custom controls. For safety, the microwave is equipped with a keypad lockout to prevent unauthorized use. The Bella Microwave carries a 1 year manufacturer's warranty
